thread.title: Draymond Green is the blocking machine the Warriors needed vs. the 76ers
thread.title_full: Draymond Green is the blocking machine the Warriors needed vs. the 76ers

author: Harry Lyles Jr.
title: Draymond Green is the blocking machine the Warriors needed vs. the 76ers
text:
There’s nothing he can’t do.
Draymond Green had himself a game against the Sixers. He finished with 20 points, 8 assists, 7 rebounds, 6 blocks, and 4 steals in the Warriors victory.
The Warriors came back after being down late in the second half, coming up with key plays down the stretch. One was this incredible block by Green:
Usually you want players to block it and keep the ball in play, but that wasn’t going to happen regardless. Green swatted it with authority, giving the Warriors and Oracle Arena as much life as they had all game.
It’s plays like this why Green is their emotional leader.
